page.title: 08SANDWICK KNITWEAR FACTORY
page.content: The Knitting Factory is situated in the area of Sandwick known as Hoswick and trades under the name of Laurence J. Smith Ltd. {THE OPENING} The factory was opened in 1969 by Her Majesty The Queen accompanied by The Duke of Edinburgh and Princess Anne. {THE WORKFORCE} All the garments, except for samples are made by out-workers in their own homes. The garments are taken to the factory for washing and dressing. The final process is the brushing of the garments to raise the pile. {FASHION COLOURS} This year the fashionable colours are bright ones, such as scarlet, emerald green and yellow.
